channel.title: WordPress Plugin Development on Codetab
channel.description: Recent content in WordPress Plugin Development on Codetab

item.title: Introduction - WordPress Plugin Development - CodeTab
item.description: CodeTab WordPress Plugin Development Tutorial Some time back, we released Share on Social, a social media sharing plugin. To share the experience with aspiring plugin developers, this guide explains plugin coding and unit testing to develop a production level plugin.     There are enough blogs about WordPress Plugin Development. However, it is difficult to find a complete tutorial that explains structure and working of a production ready plugin. In other words, a guide that covers a plugin project from start to end is not easily available.
